"use client" import { useEffect, useState } from "react" import Table from "../../components/Table" import Card from "../../components/Card" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import api from "../../services/api" export default function DeptDashboard() { const [rows, setRows] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { ;(async () => { const { data } = await api.get("/department/queue") setRows(data) })() }, []) return (

Department Queue

{rows.map((r, i) => ( ))}
# Name Admission Status Action
{i + 1} {r.full_name} {r.admission_number} {r.status} Review
) }
